docs.snippet: Netflix Inc's video-streaming service went live in more than 130 countries on Wednesday, covering almost the entire globe except China, in a huge global push by Chief Executive Reed Hastings to counter slowing growth in the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Netflix Inc's video-streaming service went live in more than 130 countries on Wednesday, covering almost the entire globe except China, in a huge global push by Chief Executive Reed Hastings to counter slowing growth in the United States.

headline.main: Netflix Goes Global, Reaches Most Countries Except China
headline.print_headline: Netflix Goes Global, Reaches Most Countries Except China

docs.snippet: Brent crude futures fell to a fresh 11-year low on Thursday as a sliding yuan and an emergency halt in China's stock trading left Asian markets in a turmoil, while a huge supply overhang and near-record output levels also continued to drag on oil ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brent crude futures fell to a fresh 11-year low on Thursday as a sliding yuan and an emergency halt in China's stock trading left Asian markets in a turmoil, while a huge supply overhang and near-record output levels also continued to drag on oil prices.

headline.main: Global Oil Prices Hit 11-Year Low on China Market Turmoil, Storage Overhang
headline.print_headline: Global Oil Prices Hit 11-Year Low on China Market Turmoil, Storage Overhang

docs.snippet: U.S. services companies grew in December at their slowest pace since early 2014, a private survey found. But the deceleration occurred for a seemingly positive reason: Companies made deliveries faster....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. services companies grew in December at their slowest pace since early 2014, a private survey found. But the deceleration occurred for a seemingly positive reason: Companies made deliveries faster.

headline.main: Survey: Growth at US Services Companies Slowed in December

docs.snippet: Underdogs had their days, plenty of them, in 2015: Leicester City snapping at the heels of England's Premier League giants, Japan beating South Africa at the rugby World Cup, Roberta Vinci derailing Serena Williams' drive for a calendar year Grand...
